title: Message from Armin Arlert
content: What experiences in your life have shaped your understanding of trust?
extra_content: People who can’t throw something important away can never hope to change anything.

title: Message from Eren Yeager
content: How do you believe your past choices define your present self?
extra_content: If you win, you live. If you lose, you die. If you don’t fight, you can’t win!

title: Message from Mikasa Ackerman
content: In what ways do you think vulnerability can strengthen interpersonal relationships?
extra_content: This world is cruel. But it’s also very beautiful.

title: Message from Luffy
content: Power isn't determined by your size, but by the size of your heart and dreams!
extra_content: If you could have a conversation with any historical figure, which one would it be and what key question would you want to ask them?

title: Message from Levi Ackerman
content: What experiences have shaped your perspective on trust and betrayal in your relationships?
extra_content: A lesson without pain is meaningless. That’s because you can’t gain something without sacrificing something in return.

title: Message from Kakashi Hatake
content: In society, those who break the rules are scum... but those who abandon their friends are worse than scum.
extra_content: In what ways do you think technology impacts our ability to connect with one another on a deeper level?

title: Message from Light Yagami
extra_content: In what ways do you think technology affects our ability to form genuine connections with others?
content: I am justice! I protect the innocent and those who fear evil. I’m the one who will become the god of a new world!

title: Message from Gojou Satoru
content: Hey, how are you doing today?
extra_content: Throughout heaven and earth, I alone am the honored one.

title: Message from Itachi Uchiha
content: How do you define success, and what steps are you taking to achieve it in your life?
extra_content: People’s lives don’t end when they die. It ends when they lose faith.

title: Message from Zoro
extra_content: In what ways do you believe self-awareness can transform a person's interactions with others and their environment?
content: You need to accept the fact that you’re not the best and have all the will to strive to be better than anyone you face.

title: Message from Gintoki Sakata
content: If you could change one thing about the world, what would it be and why?
extra_content: You yourself have to change first, or nothing will change for you!

title: Message from Madara Uchiha
content: What do you believe is the most significant factor that shapes our identity, and why?
extra_content: Wake up to reality! Nothing ever goes as planned in this world.
